document.full_text: it was tim abromaitis and ben hansbrough (15) who got the best looks in notre dame's motion offense, and they made the zips pay with 14 and 15 points respectively.
document.title: southwest: notre dame 69, akron 56: notre dame fights off akron to advance
lines_and_colors: it was tim abromaitis and ben hansbrough (15) who got the best looks in notre dame's motion offense, and they made the zips pay with 14 and 15 points respectively.
